channel.title: Science Slam Zürich
channel.description: Recent content on Science Slam Zürich

item.title: Mavi N. Polatoglu
item.description: I am student at ETH Zürich and working part-time in IT’IS Foundation in the field of biomedical engineering. Things that excite me are engineering, science, rock ‘n’ roll, and pretty lights.

item.title: Murezi Capaul
item.description: Murezi has been with Science Slam Zurich for about a year. Being the treasurer, he must sometimes play the role of the fun-police. As opposed to the real scientists and engineers in the team, he is still in his health science and technolgy bachelors, looking to get the degree in 2020.

item.title: Benjamin Schneider
item.description: Benjamin joined Science Slam Zurich back in 2016 while working in software engineering in the events industry out of a passion for organizing events and learning about new topics. Currently studying Computer Science and Economics in Zurich, he takes care of all online activities and helps producing our events.

item.title: Jens Duru
item.description: Jens, 25 - recently graduated from ETH Zurich with a Masters in Biomedical Engineering and is currently trying to do some scijens as a PhD student.

item.title: 19.5ᵗʰ Science Slam Zürich - POSTPONED
item.description: Due to the current situation of the pandemic, we are forced to postpone this event until further notice.

item.title: Casino Science Slam
item.description: Join us at Casino Theatre Wintherthur to witness what happens when science slam meets poetry slam. Our science slam topics are used to inspire poetry slammers and create a whole new flavour. Adding to all of this, the evening will be moderated by the renowned Patti Basler.

item.title: Come Chat with Us at Zurich Life Science Day 2020
item.description: Zurich Life Science Day is the largest career fair dedicated to Life Sciences in Switzerland. This anual event, organised by the Life Science Zurich Young Scientist Network, takes place at the Lichthof of the University of Zurich, Campus Irchel. Join us on the 28th of January 2020 and interact with representatives from more than 40 companies, in our company exhibition. Moreover, you have the chance to get your CV chacked and to take a professional CV picture!
